title: Sorting Algorithm Visualizer
text: A webpage created to show the speed and how different sorting algorithms work to sort a random array.

title: Vulkan
text: iOS app developed for AGE enlisted personnel for easy tracking of scheduled inspections and equipment drop-offs.

title: Mini-Java Programming Language
text: Programming Language developed to be a mini-java type.

title: Nyx
text: A movie watchlist for iOS developed using SwiftUI to stop fights on what movies my wife and I were going to watch for the night

title: TabView
text: Swift package implementation for tabbed views within SwiftUI.

title: PT Ace
text: iOS application for managing and conducting Air Force PT tests

title: RPG Text Based Game
text: A clone of ZORG, a terminal based roleplaying game developed using Java.
